title: Eyes on the Image: Gaze-Supervised Multimodal Learning for Chest X-ray Diagnosis and Report Generation
venue: Submitted to Computers in Biology and Medicine
description: Two-stage multimodal framework that integrates chest X-ray images, clinical labels, bounding boxes, and radiologist gaze data. A gaze-guided contrastive model improves disease classification (F1 up 5.7%, AUC up 3.4%), while a region-grounded report generation pipeline produces more accurate and interpretable radiology reports.

title: Hybrid Quantum-Classical Learning for Multiclass Image Classification
venue: Journal of Quantum Machine Intelligence Â· 2025
description: Hybrid quantum-classical QCNN that reuses qubits discarded during pooling to preserve entanglement while coupling recycled qubits with classical layers. Achieves higher accuracy on MNIST, Fashion-MNIST, and OrganAMNIST with a lightweight parameter footprint suitable for NISQ hardware.
